name: Frozen Slushy Maker: Make Fun Icy Fruit Slushies! by Free Food Maker Games Factory
name_original: Frozen Slushy Maker: Make Fun Icy Fruit Slushies! by Free Food Maker Games Factory
description:
Download now! You've never tried a maker game like this before!

The game is hands down the best slush maker in the app store! With 40 different delicious flavors and dozens of unique decorations, you will have hours of fun with this game!

Choose from crazy flavors like:
- Cotton Candy!
- Key Lime Pie!
- Magic Potion!
- Tiger Blood!
- Wedding Cake!
- Witch's Brew!

Amazing Decorations like:
- Funny Faces!
- Ladybugs!
- Butterflies!
- Snowflakes!
- Lightning!

Plus you can share your Slushies with friends by email or on Facebook. Download this game now and start enjoying your own special slushie today!!
